about_the_game:
Dive into the rich legacy of Color Lines, a game born in the late 20th century, now revitalized for the modern gaming era. Perfect for both novices and seasoned players, Color Lines combines intuitive gameplay with a robust strategic depth.

Gameplay at a Glance:

Position colorful orbs on a grid, striving to align five of the same hue. But here's the catch: each move not resulting in a line spawns three new balls. The challenge? Keep the board from filling up as you weave through this captivating puzzle maze.

Why Color Lines?

Historic Charm, Modern Flair: Experience a game that has stood the test of time, enhanced with crisp graphics and seamless mechanics.

Climb the Ranks: Compete with friends and players globally. Where do you stand on the Color Lines Leaderboard?

Customize Your Experience: Choose from five board sizes and bespoke piece sets.

Game Mastery: Levels ranging from beginner to expert ensure a curve that respects both new players and puzzle veterans.

Sleek Design: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning playfield, crafted with attention to detail.

Unleash your strategic prowess. How long can you outwit the ever-growing challenge?

Rediscover, rejoice, and reignite your passion for puzzles. Welcome to Color Lines: where history meets modern gaming delight. Join the legacy today!
